name: B. Shifting
statement:
John Doe has found the beautiful permutation formula.Let’s take
permutation . Let’s define transformation of this permutation: where is
an integer, the transformation parameter, is such maximum integer that .
If , then elements and so on are omitted. In other words, the described
transformation of permutation cyclically shifts to the left each
consecutive block of length and the last block with the length equal to
the remainder after dividing by . John Doe thinks that permutation is
beautiful. Unfortunately, he cannot quickly find the beautiful
permutation he’s interested in. That’s why he asked you to help him.Your
task is to find a beautiful permutation for the given . For
clarifications, see the notes to the third sample.
